availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha A. Spurlock Burgess. Father of Strother Burgess, Goble Burgess, Susan M. Burgess, Virginia C. Burgess, Charity C. Burgess, Pamelia F. Burgess, Martha R. Burgess, George Burgess, William Burgess, Catherine Burgess. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1850. Farmer in Boyd County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 110A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, p. 703.
Find A Grave, "George R. Burgess (1813-1900)," Memorial #122825171, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/122825171 (accessed 11 May 2017).
